vault.name: 50 Tier 1 Real Prompts Vault
vault.description: Professional AI prompts collection for enhanced productivity

categories.name: Writing & Content
categories.description: Creative writing and content creation prompts

prompts.title: Professional Email Writer
prompts.description: Create compelling professional emails with perfect tone
prompts.content: Act as a professional email writer. I need you to write a [TYPE OF EMAIL] email to [RECIPIENT] about [TOPIC]. The tone should be [TONE: professional/friendly/urgent/etc.]. Key points to include: [LIST KEY POINTS]. The email should be [LENGTH: brief/detailed] and include a clear call-to-action. Please structure it with an appropriate subject line, greeting, body paragraphs, and professional closing.

prompts.title: Blog Post Structure Creator
prompts.description: Generate comprehensive blog post outlines and content
prompts.content: You are an expert content strategist and blog writer. Create a comprehensive blog post about [TOPIC] for [TARGET AUDIENCE]. Structure: 1) Compelling headline (include 3 variations), 2) Meta description (155 chars max), 3) Introduction hook, 4) 5-7 main sections with subheadings, 5) Key takeaways, 6) Call-to-action. Include SEO keywords: [KEYWORDS]. Tone: [TONE]. Word count target: [WORD COUNT]. Add relevant statistics, examples, and actionable tips throughout.

prompts.title: Creative Story Generator
prompts.description: Craft engaging stories with dynamic characters
prompts.content: Act as a creative storyteller. Write a [GENRE] story of [LENGTH] featuring [CHARACTER DESCRIPTION]. Setting: [TIME PERIOD] in [LOCATION]. Central conflict: [CONFLICT TYPE]. Include these elements: [SPECIFIC REQUIREMENTS]. The story should have a clear beginning, middle, and end, with vivid descriptions, realistic dialogue, and character development. Tone: [TONE]. Target audience: [AUDIENCE].

prompts.title: Social Media Caption Master
prompts.description: Create viral social media captions that engage
prompts.content: You're a social media expert specializing in viral content. Create [NUMBER] engaging captions for [PLATFORM] about [TOPIC/PRODUCT]. Target audience: [AUDIENCE]. Brand voice: [VOICE DESCRIPTION]. Each caption should: 1) Start with a hook, 2) Include value/entertainment, 3) Have a clear CTA, 4) Use relevant hashtags, 5) Be platform-optimized length. Include emojis strategically. Variations: [FORMAL/CASUAL/HUMOROUS]. Add engagement questions and trending elements where appropriate.

prompts.title: Press Release Builder
prompts.description: Professional press release for announcements
prompts.content: Act as a PR professional. Write a compelling press release for [COMPANY/ORGANIZATION] announcing [ANNOUNCEMENT]. Include: 1) Attention-grabbing headline, 2) Location and date, 3) Strong opening paragraph answering who, what, when, where, why, 4) Supporting details and quotes from key stakeholders, 5) Company boilerplate, 6) Media contact information. Tone: [PROFESSIONAL/EXCITING/INFORMATIVE]. Target media: [MEDIA TYPE]. Include relevant industry keywords and make it newsworthy.

prompts.title: Academic Essay Assistant
prompts.description: Structure and write academic essays with citations
prompts.content: You are an academic writing expert. Help me write a [LENGTH] academic essay on [TOPIC] for [ACADEMIC LEVEL]. Required structure: 1) Introduction with thesis statement, 2) Literature review section, 3) Main arguments with supporting evidence, 4) Counter-arguments and rebuttals, 5) Conclusion. Citation style: [APA/MLA/Chicago]. Include: scholarly sources, critical analysis, proper transitions, and academic language. Provide an outline first, then the full essay with in-text citations and bibliography.

prompts.title: Product Description Optimizer
prompts.description: Write converting product descriptions for e-commerce
prompts.content: Act as an e-commerce copywriter. Write a compelling product description for [PRODUCT NAME]. Product details: [SPECIFICATIONS]. Target audience: [CUSTOMER PROFILE]. Key benefits: [LIST BENEFITS]. Price point: [PRICE RANGE]. Include: 1) Attention-grabbing headline, 2) Benefit-focused bullet points, 3) Emotional triggers, 4) Social proof elements, 5) Clear call-to-action, 6) SEO-optimized keywords: [KEYWORDS]. Address common objections and create urgency. Optimize for conversions.

prompts.title: Grant Proposal Writer
prompts.description: Professional grant proposals that win funding
prompts.content: Act as a grant writing expert. Create a compelling grant proposal for [ORGANIZATION] seeking [AMOUNT] funding for [PROJECT/CAUSE]. Include: 1) Executive summary, 2) Statement of need with statistics, 3) Project description and methodology, 4) Goals and measurable outcomes, 5) Timeline and milestones, 6) Budget breakdown, 7) Organization qualifications, 8) Evaluation plan. Target funder: [FOUNDATION/AGENCY]. Emphasize impact, sustainability, and alignment with funder priorities.

prompts.title: Resume & Cover Letter Builder
prompts.description: ATS-optimized resumes and compelling cover letters
prompts.content: You are a career counselor and resume expert. Create an ATS-optimized resume and cover letter for [JOB TITLE] position at [COMPANY]. Experience level: [ENTRY/MID/SENIOR]. Key qualifications: [LIST SKILLS/EXPERIENCE]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Include: 1) Professional summary, 2) Skills section with keywords, 3) Work experience with quantified achievements, 4) Education and certifications, 5) Compelling cover letter addressing specific job requirements. Format for ATS systems and highlight relevant accomplishments.

prompts.title: Business Plan Generator
prompts.description: Create comprehensive business plans with financial projections
prompts.content: Act as a business consultant and create a detailed business plan for [BUSINESS IDEA]. Include: 1) Executive Summary, 2) Company Description, 3) Market Analysis (target market, competition, trends), 4) Organization & Management structure, 5) Products/Services description, 6) Marketing & Sales strategy, 7) Financial projections (3-year), 8) Funding requirements, 9) Risk analysis, 10) Implementation timeline. Make it investor-ready with specific metrics, realistic assumptions, and actionable strategies. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Location: [LOCATION]. Investment needed: [AMOUNT].

prompts.title: SWOT Analysis Expert
prompts.description: Comprehensive SWOT analysis for strategic planning
prompts.content: You are a strategic business analyst. Conduct a thorough SWOT analysis for [COMPANY/PROJECT]. Company details: [DESCRIPTION]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Current situation: [CONTEXT]. Analyze: STRENGTHS (internal positive factors), WEAKNESSES (internal negative factors), OPPORTUNITIES (external positive factors), THREATS (external negative factors). For each quadrant, provide 5-7 detailed points with explanations. Then create strategic recommendations: SO strategies (leverage strengths for opportunities), WO strategies (overcome weaknesses for opportunities), ST strategies (use strengths to avoid threats), WT strategies (minimize weaknesses and threats).

prompts.title: Financial Projection Builder
prompts.description: Create detailed financial forecasts and budgets
prompts.content: Act as a financial analyst. Create comprehensive financial projections for [BUSINESS/PROJECT] for the next [TIME PERIOD]. Include: 1) Revenue projections with assumptions, 2) Cost of goods sold analysis, 3) Operating expenses breakdown, 4) Cash flow projections (monthly for year 1, quarterly for years 2-3), 5) Break-even analysis, 6) Key financial ratios, 7) Scenario planning (best case, worst case, realistic), 8) Capital requirements and funding needs. Business type: [TYPE]. Current revenue: [AMOUNT]. Growth assumptions: [PERCENTAGE]. Provide detailed explanations for all assumptions.

prompts.title: Market Research Analyzer
prompts.description: Comprehensive market analysis and competitor research
prompts.content: You are a market research specialist. Conduct comprehensive market research for [PRODUCT/SERVICE] in [MARKET/INDUSTRY]. Include: 1) Market size and growth potential, 2) Target customer demographics and psychographics, 3) Customer needs and pain points, 4) Competitive landscape analysis, 5) Market trends and opportunities, 6) Pricing analysis, 7) Entry barriers and challenges, 8) Distribution channels, 9) Regulatory considerations, 10) Market entry recommendations. Geographic focus: [LOCATION]. Provide data-driven insights with actionable recommendations.

prompts.title: Investor Pitch Deck Creator
prompts.description: Compelling pitch decks that secure funding
prompts.content: Act as a pitch deck expert who has helped startups raise millions. Create a compelling investor pitch deck for [STARTUP/PROJECT]. Include these 12-15 slides: 1) Title slide, 2) Problem statement, 3) Solution overview, 4) Market opportunity, 5) Product/service demo, 6) Business model, 7) Traction and validation, 8) Marketing strategy, 9) Competition analysis, 10) Team introduction, 11) Financial projections, 12) Funding ask and use of funds, 13) Exit strategy. For each slide, provide: slide title, key points, visual suggestions, and presenter notes. Make it story-driven and investor-focused.

prompts.title: Risk Assessment Framework
prompts.description: Identify and mitigate business risks effectively
prompts.content: You are a risk management consultant. Create a comprehensive risk assessment for [BUSINESS/PROJECT]. Include: 1) Risk identification across categories (financial, operational, strategic, compliance, reputational), 2) Risk probability assessment (1-5 scale), 3) Impact severity analysis (1-5 scale), 4) Risk matrix and prioritization, 5) Mitigation strategies for high-priority risks, 6) Contingency planning, 7) Monitoring and review procedures, 8) Risk ownership assignment, 9) Key risk indicators (KRIs). Business context: [DESCRIPTION]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Provide actionable risk management recommendations.

prompts.title: Digital Transformation Roadmap
prompts.description: Strategic digital transformation planning
prompts.content: Act as a digital transformation consultant. Create a comprehensive digital transformation roadmap for [ORGANIZATION]. Current state: [DESCRIPTION]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Include: 1) Digital maturity assessment, 2) Transformation objectives and success metrics, 3) Technology stack recommendations, 4) Process optimization opportunities, 5) Change management strategy, 6) Implementation phases with timelines, 7) Budget and resource requirements, 8) Risk mitigation plans, 9) Training and upskilling needs, 10) ROI projections. Focus on practical, phased approach with quick wins and long-term strategic goals.

prompts.title: Partnership Strategy Developer
prompts.description: Strategic partnerships and alliance planning
prompts.content: You are a strategic partnerships expert. Develop a comprehensive partnership strategy for [COMPANY]. Business goals: [OBJECTIVES]. Include: 1) Partnership objectives and success metrics, 2) Ideal partner profile and selection criteria, 3) Partnership types (strategic, channel, technology, etc.), 4) Value proposition for partners, 5) Partnership structure and governance, 6) Legal and commercial considerations, 7) Partner onboarding process, 8) Performance management framework, 9) Relationship management best practices, 10) Exit strategies. Provide templates for partner evaluation and partnership agreements.

prompts.title: Code Review Assistant
prompts.description: Comprehensive code analysis and improvement suggestions
prompts.content: Act as a senior software engineer conducting a code review. Analyze the following code and provide: 1) Overall assessment (readability, performance, security), 2) Specific issues found (bugs, code smells, vulnerabilities), 3) Improvement suggestions with examples, 4) Best practices recommendations, 5) Performance optimization tips, 6) Testing suggestions, 7) Documentation improvements. Code: [PASTE CODE]. Language: [PROGRAMMING LANGUAGE]. Context: [PROJECT DESCRIPTION]. Focus areas: [SECURITY/PERFORMANCE/MAINTAINABILITY]. Provide before/after examples where applicable.

prompts.title: API Documentation Generator
prompts.description: Create comprehensive API documentation
prompts.content: You are a technical writer specializing in API documentation. Create comprehensive documentation for [API NAME]. Include: 1) API overview and purpose, 2) Authentication methods, 3) Base URL and versioning, 4) Endpoint details with HTTP methods, 5) Request/response examples, 6) Error codes and handling, 7) Rate limiting information, 8) SDK examples in multiple languages, 9) Postman collection, 10) Changelog. For each endpoint include: description, parameters, headers, request body schema, response schema, example requests/responses. Make it developer-friendly with interactive examples.

prompts.title: Database Schema Designer
prompts.description: Design optimized database schemas and relationships
prompts.content: Act as a database architect. Design a comprehensive database schema for [APPLICATION/SYSTEM]. Requirements: [LIST REQUIREMENTS]. Include: 1) Entity relationship diagram description, 2) Table structures with fields, data types, and constraints, 3) Primary and foreign key relationships, 4) Indexes for performance optimization, 5) Normalization considerations, 6) Data validation rules, 7) Sample data for testing, 8) Migration scripts, 9) Performance optimization suggestions, 10) Backup and recovery considerations. Database type: [MYSQL/POSTGRESQL/MONGODB]. Provide SQL/NoSQL scripts as appropriate.

prompts.title: Testing Strategy Builder
prompts.description: Comprehensive testing strategies and test cases
prompts.content: You are a QA engineer and testing expert. Create a comprehensive testing strategy for [APPLICATION/FEATURE]. Include: 1) Test planning and scope, 2) Testing types (unit, integration, system, acceptance), 3) Test case templates and examples, 4) Automation strategy and tools, 5) Performance testing approach, 6) Security testing considerations, 7) Test data management, 8) Bug reporting and tracking, 9) Test environment setup, 10) Regression testing plan. Application type: [WEB/MOBILE/API]. Technology stack: [TECHNOLOGIES]. Provide sample test cases and automation scripts.

prompts.title: Security Audit Checklist
prompts.description: Comprehensive security assessment and hardening
prompts.content: Act as a cybersecurity expert. Create a comprehensive security audit checklist for [APPLICATION/SYSTEM]. Include: 1) Authentication and authorization review, 2) Data encryption and protection, 3) Input validation and sanitization, 4) SQL injection and XSS prevention, 5) API security assessment, 6) Infrastructure security, 7) Code analysis for vulnerabilities, 8) Dependency security scan, 9) Compliance requirements (GDPR, HIPAA, etc.), 10) Incident response planning. Technology stack: [TECHNOLOGIES]. Provide specific recommendations and remediation steps for common vulnerabilities.

prompts.title: DevOps Pipeline Creator
prompts.description: CI/CD pipeline setup and automation
prompts.content: You are a DevOps engineer. Design a comprehensive CI/CD pipeline for [PROJECT]. Include: 1) Source code management setup, 2) Build automation configuration, 3) Automated testing integration, 4) Code quality checks and gates, 5) Security scanning, 6) Deployment strategies (blue-green, canary, rolling), 7) Environment management (dev, staging, prod), 8) Monitoring and alerting, 9) Rollback procedures, 10) Documentation and runbooks. Technology stack: [TECHNOLOGIES]. Platform: [AWS/AZURE/GCP]. Provide YAML configurations and shell scripts as needed.

prompts.title: System Architecture Designer
prompts.description: Scalable system architecture and design patterns
prompts.content: Act as a solutions architect. Design a scalable system architecture for [APPLICATION/SYSTEM]. Requirements: [FUNCTIONAL AND NON-FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS]. Include: 1) High-level architecture diagram, 2) Component breakdown and responsibilities, 3) Data flow and communication patterns, 4) Technology stack recommendations, 5) Scalability and performance considerations, 6) Security architecture, 7) Deployment topology, 8) Monitoring and observability, 9) Disaster recovery planning, 10) Cost optimization strategies. Expected load: [USER COUNT/REQUESTS]. Provide detailed explanations for architectural decisions.

prompts.title: Code Optimization Expert
prompts.description: Performance optimization and code efficiency
prompts.content: You are a performance optimization expert. Analyze and optimize the following code for [PERFORMANCE GOAL]. Code: [PASTE CODE]. Language: [PROGRAMMING LANGUAGE]. Include: 1) Performance bottleneck identification, 2) Algorithm optimization suggestions, 3) Memory usage improvements, 4) Database query optimization, 5) Caching strategies, 6) Profiling recommendations, 7) Before/after performance comparisons, 8) Load testing suggestions, 9) Monitoring metrics, 10) Best practices for ongoing optimization. Provide optimized code examples with explanations.

prompts.title: Digital Marketing Strategy
prompts.description: Comprehensive digital marketing campaigns
prompts.content: Act as a digital marketing strategist. Create a comprehensive digital marketing strategy for [COMPANY/PRODUCT]. Target audience: [DEMOGRAPHICS]. Budget: [AMOUNT]. Include: 1) Marketing objectives and KPIs, 2) Target audience personas, 3) Competitive analysis, 4) Channel strategy (social media, email, content, PPC), 5) Content marketing plan, 6) Social media calendar, 7) Email marketing campaigns, 8) SEO strategy, 9) Paid advertising recommendations, 10) Analytics and tracking setup, 11) Timeline and budget allocation. Provide specific tactics and measurable goals.

prompts.title: Customer Persona Builder
prompts.description: Detailed customer personas for targeted marketing
prompts.content: You are a market research expert. Create detailed customer personas for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include: 1) Demographic information (age, gender, location, income), 2) Psychographic details (values, interests, lifestyle), 3) Behavioral patterns (shopping habits, media consumption), 4) Pain points and challenges, 5) Goals and motivations, 6) Communication preferences, 7) Buying journey mapping, 8) Content preferences, 9) Preferred channels and platforms, 10) Objections and barriers. Create 3-5 distinct personas with names, photos descriptions, and quotes. Base on: [TARGET MARKET RESEARCH/DATA].

prompts.title: Sales Funnel Optimizer
prompts.description: High-converting sales funnels and customer journey
prompts.content: Act as a conversion optimization expert. Design a high-converting sales funnel for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Current conversion rate: [PERCENTAGE]. Include: 1) Awareness stage tactics, 2) Interest generation strategies, 3) Consideration phase nurturing, 4) Decision stage conversion, 5) Retention and upselling, 6) Landing page optimization, 7) Email sequences, 8) Lead magnets and incentives, 9) A/B testing recommendations, 10) Analytics tracking setup. Target audience: [DESCRIPTION]. Price point: [AMOUNT]. Provide specific copy examples and design suggestions.

prompts.title: Brand Identity Creator
prompts.description: Complete brand identity and positioning strategy
prompts.content: You are a brand strategist. Create a comprehensive brand identity for [COMPANY/PRODUCT]. Include: 1) Brand purpose and mission, 2) Brand values and personality, 3) Unique value proposition, 4) Brand positioning statement, 5) Target audience definition, 6) Brand voice and tone guidelines, 7) Visual identity recommendations (colors, fonts, imagery), 8) Brand messaging hierarchy, 9) Competitor differentiation, 10) Brand guidelines document. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Target market: [MARKET]. Create a memorable and authentic brand that resonates with your audience.

prompts.title: Influencer Marketing Campaign
prompts.description: Strategic influencer partnerships and campaigns
prompts.content: Act as an influencer marketing specialist. Design an influencer marketing campaign for [PRODUCT/BRAND]. Budget: [AMOUNT]. Include: 1) Campaign objectives and KPIs, 2) Influencer selection criteria, 3) Tier strategy (micro, macro, mega influencers), 4) Content requirements and guidelines, 5) Compensation structure, 6) Contract templates, 7) Campaign timeline, 8) Content approval process, 9) Performance tracking metrics, 10) ROI measurement framework. Target audience: [DEMOGRAPHICS]. Platform focus: [INSTAGRAM/TIKTOK/YOUTUBE]. Provide influencer outreach templates and campaign briefs.

prompts.title: Email Marketing Automation
prompts.description: High-converting email sequences and automation
prompts.content: You are an email marketing expert. Create a comprehensive email marketing automation system for [BUSINESS TYPE]. Include: 1) Welcome series (5-7 emails), 2) Lead nurturing sequences, 3) Abandoned cart recovery, 4) Re-engagement campaigns, 5) Customer onboarding flow, 6) Upsell/cross-sell sequences, 7) Segmentation strategies, 8) Subject line variations, 9) A/B testing plan, 10) Performance metrics and optimization. Target audience: [DESCRIPTION]. Product/service: [DETAILS]. Provide email copy examples and automation workflows.

prompts.title: SEO Content Strategy
prompts.description: Comprehensive SEO and content marketing plan
prompts.content: Act as an SEO specialist and content strategist. Create a comprehensive SEO content strategy for [WEBSITE/BUSINESS]. Target keywords: [LIST KEYWORDS]. Include: 1) Keyword research and mapping, 2) Content audit and gap analysis, 3) Content calendar (3-6 months), 4) On-page SEO optimization, 5) Technical SEO recommendations, 6) Link building strategy, 7) Local SEO tactics (if applicable), 8) Content types and formats, 9) Performance tracking metrics, 10) Competitor analysis. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Target audience: [DESCRIPTION]. Provide specific content ideas and optimization checklists.

prompts.title: PPC Campaign Manager
prompts.description: High-ROI paid advertising campaigns
prompts.content: You are a PPC advertising expert. Create a comprehensive paid advertising strategy for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Budget: [AMOUNT]. Include: 1) Campaign structure and ad groups, 2) Keyword research and bidding strategy, 3) Ad copy variations (headlines, descriptions), 4) Landing page recommendations, 5) Targeting options (demographics, interests, behaviors), 6) Bid management strategy, 7) Conversion tracking setup, 8) A/B testing plan, 9) Budget allocation across platforms, 10) Performance optimization tactics. Platforms: [GOOGLE ADS/FACEBOOK/LINKEDIN]. Provide ad copy examples and campaign setups.

prompts.title: Curriculum Designer
prompts.description: Educational curriculum and learning pathway design
prompts.content: Act as an instructional designer. Create a comprehensive curriculum for [SUBJECT/SKILL]. Target audience: [STUDENT LEVEL/DEMOGRAPHICS]. Duration: [TIMEFRAME]. Include: 1) Learning objectives and outcomes, 2) Course structure and modules, 3) Lesson plans with activities, 4) Assessment methods and rubrics, 5) Required resources and materials, 6) Teaching methodologies, 7) Student engagement strategies, 8) Progress tracking system, 9) Differentiation for various learning styles, 10) Final project or capstone. Format: [ONLINE/CLASSROOM/HYBRID]. Align with educational standards where applicable.

prompts.title: Study Guide Generator
prompts.description: Comprehensive study materials and guides
prompts.content: You are an educational content creator. Create a comprehensive study guide for [SUBJECT/TOPIC]. Academic level: [GRADE/COLLEGE LEVEL]. Include: 1) Key concepts and definitions, 2) Topic summaries with explanations, 3) Visual aids and diagrams descriptions, 4) Practice questions with answers, 5) Memory techniques and mnemonics, 6) Study schedule template, 7) Self-assessment checklist, 8) Additional resources and references, 9) Common mistakes to avoid, 10) Exam preparation tips. Format for easy review and retention. Exam type: [STANDARDIZED TEST/FINAL EXAM/CERTIFICATION].

prompts.title: Interactive Learning Activities
prompts.description: Engaging educational activities and exercises
prompts.content: Act as an education specialist. Design interactive learning activities for [SUBJECT/TOPIC]. Age group: [AGE RANGE]. Class size: [NUMBER]. Include: 1) Warm-up/ice-breaker activities, 2) Hands-on experiments or projects, 3) Group collaboration exercises, 4) Problem-solving challenges, 5) Role-playing scenarios, 6) Technology integration ideas, 7) Assessment rubrics, 8) Materials and resource lists, 9) Adaptation for different learning styles, 10) Extension activities for advanced learners. Learning objectives: [OBJECTIVES]. Duration: [TIME PER ACTIVITY].

prompts.title: Assessment and Rubric Creator
prompts.description: Fair and comprehensive assessment tools
prompts.content: You are an assessment specialist. Create comprehensive assessment tools for [SUBJECT/SKILL]. Include: 1) Learning objectives alignment, 2) Multiple assessment types (formative, summative), 3) Detailed rubrics with criteria, 4) Question banks with various difficulty levels, 5) Performance indicators and benchmarks, 6) Feedback templates, 7) Grading guidelines, 8) Accommodation options for diverse learners, 9) Self-assessment tools, 10) Portfolio assessment components. Assessment purpose: [DIAGNOSTIC/PROGRESS/FINAL]. Provide clear scoring guides and example responses.

prompts.title: Online Course Builder
prompts.description: Complete online learning experience design
prompts.content: Act as an online education expert. Design a complete online course for [TOPIC/SKILL]. Target audience: [DEMOGRAPHICS]. Include: 1) Course outline and learning path, 2) Video content scripts and storyboards, 3) Interactive elements and quizzes, 4) Downloadable resources and worksheets, 5) Community building strategies, 6) Student engagement tactics, 7) Progress tracking system, 8) Completion certificates, 9) Marketing and launch strategy, 10) Student support system. Platform: [LMS/PLATFORM]. Duration: [HOURS/WEEKS]. Price point: [AMOUNT]. Provide detailed module breakdowns.

prompts.title: Learning Disability Support
prompts.description: Inclusive education strategies and accommodations
prompts.content: You are a special education specialist. Create an inclusive learning support plan for students with [LEARNING DISABILITY/CHALLENGE]. Include: 1) Understanding of the learning difference, 2) Classroom accommodation strategies, 3) Modified assessment approaches, 4) Assistive technology recommendations, 5) Multi-sensory teaching techniques, 6) Behavioral support strategies, 7) Parent and family involvement, 8) IEP/504 plan components, 9) Progress monitoring methods, 10) Transition planning considerations. Age group: [AGE RANGE]. Subject focus: [SUBJECT]. Provide practical implementation guidelines.

prompts.title: Educational Technology Integration
prompts.description: Technology-enhanced learning experiences
prompts.content: Act as an educational technology specialist. Create a technology integration plan for [SUBJECT/GRADE LEVEL]. Available technology: [DEVICES/PLATFORMS]. Include: 1) Technology-enhanced lesson plans, 2) Digital tool recommendations with tutorials, 3) Student digital citizenship curriculum, 4) Online collaboration strategies, 5) Virtual field trip ideas, 6) Assessment technology tools, 7) Parent communication platforms, 8) Professional development for educators, 9) Technical support considerations, 10) Digital equity planning. Learning objectives: [OBJECTIVES]. Provide step-by-step implementation guides.

prompts.title: Professional Development Workshop
prompts.description: Employee training and skill development programs
prompts.content: You are a corporate training specialist. Design a professional development workshop on [TOPIC/SKILL]. Target audience: [EMPLOYEE LEVEL/DEPARTMENT]. Include: 1) Learning objectives and outcomes, 2) Workshop agenda and timeline, 3) Interactive activities and exercises, 4) Case studies and real-world applications, 5) Group discussions and breakout sessions, 6) Skills assessment tools, 7) Action planning templates, 8) Follow-up and reinforcement strategies, 9) Resource materials and handouts, 10) Evaluation and feedback forms. Duration: [HOURS/DAYS]. Delivery format: [IN-PERSON/VIRTUAL/HYBRID].

prompts.title: Personal Productivity System
prompts.description: Complete productivity methodology and workflow
prompts.content: Act as a productivity consultant. Create a comprehensive personal productivity system for [PROFESSION/ROLE]. Current challenges: [CHALLENGES]. Include: 1) Task management methodology, 2) Time blocking and scheduling system, 3) Priority matrix and decision framework, 4) Digital tools and app recommendations, 5) Email and communication management, 6) Project planning templates, 7) Habit tracking systems, 8) Work-life balance strategies, 9) Energy management techniques, 10) Weekly and monthly review processes. Goals: [PRODUCTIVITY GOALS]. Provide implementation templates and checklists.

prompts.title: Goal Setting and Achievement
prompts.description: SMART goal framework and achievement strategies
prompts.content: You are a goal-setting expert. Create a comprehensive goal achievement system for [SPECIFIC GOAL/AREA]. Include: 1) SMART goal formulation, 2) Goal breakdown into milestones, 3) Action plan with deadlines, 4) Obstacle identification and solutions, 5) Progress tracking system, 6) Accountability measures, 7) Motivation and reward system, 8) Regular review and adjustment process, 9) Success metrics and KPIs, 10) Celebration and reflection rituals. Timeline: [TIMEFRAME]. Current situation: [STARTING POINT]. Provide templates and tracking sheets.

prompts.title: Meeting Optimizer
prompts.description: Efficient meeting planning and management
prompts.content: Act as a meeting efficiency expert. Create a comprehensive meeting optimization system for [ORGANIZATION TYPE]. Include: 1) Meeting assessment criteria (necessity check), 2) Pre-meeting preparation templates, 3) Agenda templates for different meeting types, 4) Facilitation techniques and tools, 5) Time management strategies, 6) Participant engagement methods, 7) Decision-making frameworks, 8) Action item tracking systems, 9) Follow-up and accountability processes, 10) Meeting effectiveness evaluation. Meeting types: [TYPES]. Team size: [SIZE]. Provide meeting templates and best practices.

prompts.title: Digital Detox Planner
prompts.description: Healthy technology use and digital wellness
prompts.content: You are a digital wellness coach. Create a comprehensive digital detox and healthy technology use plan for [TARGET PERSON/SITUATION]. Current usage: [HOURS/HABITS]. Include: 1) Digital habit audit and assessment, 2) Screen time reduction strategies, 3) App and notification management, 4) Alternative activities and hobbies, 5) Mindfulness and presence practices, 6) Social media boundary setting, 7) Work-life digital boundaries, 8) Family/household digital rules, 9) Progressive detox timeline, 10) Long-term maintenance strategies. Goals: [WELLNESS GOALS]. Provide tracking templates and accountability measures.

prompts.title: Workflow Automation Designer
prompts.description: Automated workflows and process optimization
prompts.content: Act as a workflow automation specialist. Design automated workflows for [BUSINESS PROCESS/TASK]. Current manual process: [DESCRIPTION]. Include: 1) Process mapping and analysis, 2) Automation opportunities identification, 3) Tool and software recommendations, 4) Workflow design and logic, 5) Integration strategies, 6) Error handling and fallbacks, 7) Testing and validation procedures, 8) Training and documentation, 9) Performance monitoring, 10) Continuous improvement process. Budget: [AMOUNT]. Technical level: [BEGINNER/ADVANCED]. Provide step-by-step implementation guides.

prompts.title: Energy Management System
prompts.description: Optimize energy levels and peak performance
prompts.content: You are an energy management coach. Create a comprehensive energy optimization system for [PROFESSION/LIFESTYLE]. Include: 1) Energy audit and pattern identification, 2) Circadian rhythm optimization, 3) Nutrition and hydration strategies, 4) Exercise and movement protocols, 5) Sleep optimization techniques, 6) Stress management methods, 7) Recovery and restoration practices, 8) Environment design for energy, 9) Task scheduling based on energy levels, 10) Sustainable energy maintenance. Current challenges: [ENERGY ISSUES]. Provide daily and weekly templates.

prompts.title: Project Management Framework
prompts.description: Complete project planning and execution system
prompts.content: Act as a project management expert. Create a comprehensive project management framework for [PROJECT TYPE]. Include: 1) Project charter and scope definition, 2) Stakeholder analysis and communication plan, 3) Work breakdown structure (WBS), 4) Timeline and milestone planning, 5) Resource allocation and management, 6) Risk assessment and mitigation, 7) Quality assurance processes, 8) Progress tracking and reporting, 9) Change management procedures, 10) Project closure and lessons learned. Project size: [SMALL/MEDIUM/LARGE]. Team size: [NUMBER]. Provide templates and checklists.

prompts.title: Habit Formation System
prompts.description: Build lasting positive habits and break bad ones
prompts.content: You are a behavioral change expert. Create a comprehensive habit formation system for [SPECIFIC HABIT/BEHAVIOR]. Include: 1) Habit analysis and trigger identification, 2) Implementation intention setting, 3) Environment design strategies, 4) Habit stacking techniques, 5) Progress tracking methods, 6) Motivation and reward systems, 7) Obstacle anticipation and solutions, 8) Social support and accountability, 9) Habit maintenance strategies, 10) Relapse recovery protocols. Current situation: [STARTING POINT]. Timeline: [TIMEFRAME]. Provide daily tracking templates and milestone celebrations.

prompts.title: Content Calendar Creator
prompts.description: Strategic content planning and editorial calendar
prompts.content: Act as a content strategist. Create a comprehensive 3-month content calendar for [BRAND/PLATFORM]. Include: 1) Content themes and pillars, 2) Platform-specific content types, 3) Publishing schedule and frequency, 4) Seasonal and trending topics integration, 5) Content repurposing strategy, 6) Engagement and community management, 7) Visual content planning, 8) Hashtag strategies, 9) Performance tracking metrics, 10) Content creation workflow. Target audience: [DEMOGRAPHICS]. Platforms: [SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORMS]. Goals: [ENGAGEMENT/LEADS/SALES]. Provide monthly breakdowns and content templates.

prompts.title: Crisis Management Plan
prompts.description: Comprehensive crisis response and recovery strategy
prompts.content: You are a crisis management consultant. Create a comprehensive crisis management plan for [ORGANIZATION]. Include: 1) Crisis identification and classification, 2) Crisis response team roles and responsibilities, 3) Communication protocols and message templates, 4) Stakeholder notification procedures, 5) Media relations strategy, 6) Social media crisis response, 7) Business continuity measures, 8) Legal and compliance considerations, 9) Recovery and rebuilding strategies, 10) Post-crisis evaluation and learning. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Organization size: [SIZE]. Provide emergency contact templates and response checklists.

prompts.title: Mobile App Feature Spec
prompts.description: Detailed mobile app feature specifications
prompts.content: Act as a product manager and technical writer. Create comprehensive feature specifications for [MOBILE APP FEATURE]. Include: 1) Feature overview and user value, 2) User stories and acceptance criteria, 3) UI/UX wireframes and flow, 4) Technical requirements and constraints, 5) API specifications and data models, 6) Error handling and edge cases, 7) Performance requirements, 8) Security and privacy considerations, 9) Testing strategy and test cases, 10) Launch and rollout plan. Platform: [iOS/ANDROID/CROSS-PLATFORM]. Target users: [USER TYPE]. Provide detailed mockups and technical specifications.

prompts.title: Community Building Strategy
prompts.description: Build and nurture engaged online communities
prompts.content: You are a community management expert. Create a comprehensive community building strategy for [BRAND/NICHE]. Include: 1) Community vision and values, 2) Target member personas, 3) Platform selection and setup, 4) Content strategy and engagement tactics, 5) Community guidelines and moderation, 6) Member onboarding experience, 7) Events and activities planning, 8) Ambassador and advocate programs, 9) Growth and retention strategies, 10) Success metrics and analytics. Current audience: [SIZE/DEMOGRAPHICS]. Goals: [COMMUNITY GOALS]. Provide community launch plan and engagement frameworks.

prompts.title: Microlearning Module Designer
prompts.description: Bite-sized learning experiences for busy professionals
prompts.content: Act as a microlearning specialist. Design a series of microlearning modules for [SKILL/TOPIC]. Target audience: [PROFESSIONAL LEVEL]. Include: 1) Learning objectives for each module, 2) 5-10 minute lesson structures, 3) Interactive elements and knowledge checks, 4) Just-in-time learning resources, 5) Mobile-optimized content, 6) Progress tracking and badges, 7) Spaced repetition scheduling, 8) Real-world application exercises, 9) Peer collaboration opportunities, 10) Performance support tools. Total series duration: [TIMEFRAME]. Delivery platform: [MOBILE/WEB/LMS]. Provide module scripts and interaction designs.

prompts.title: Remote Team Collaboration
prompts.description: Effective remote work and team coordination strategies
prompts.content: You are a remote work consultant. Create a comprehensive remote team collaboration system for [TEAM TYPE/SIZE]. Include: 1) Communication protocols and tools, 2) Virtual meeting best practices, 3) Project collaboration workflows, 4) File sharing and documentation systems, 5) Async work coordination methods, 6) Team building and culture activities, 7) Performance management approaches, 8) Time zone management strategies, 9) Remote onboarding processes, 10) Technology setup and security guidelines. Team size: [NUMBER]. Time zones: [LOCATIONS]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Provide implementation guides and team agreements.
